track.name: Right Next Door (Because Of Me)
comments: An outstanding blues talent who I enjoy more every time I hear him.

Interesting and original creativity of this musician intended more on contemplation than on listening. Many will find something familiar, see the familiar musical images that are professionally encoded in harmonic symbolism.

this is the first thing i ever heard from him and was drawn to it instantly for multiple reasons! 
such a sweet stroke in his playing. smooth.
Ahh, his voice is so yummy
So not mainstream. Love this dude..
I see him live every chance I get he is amazing
ROBERT CRAY IS FABULOUS MODERN DAY BLUES - NEVER TIRE OF HIS MUSIC
I love this song so much!!!
